ios.sim.debug.build: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild -project ios/example.xcodeproj -scheme example_ci -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build | xcpretty
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7 Plus

ios.sim.release.build: set -o pipefail && export CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO && export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/example.xcodeproj -scheme example_ci -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build | xcpretty
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 7 Plus
